org.ligoj.app.resource.node

Class ParameterResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ligoj.app.resource.node.ParameterResource

  • @Service
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/node")
public class ParameterResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Criteria values Business Layer for entity Parameter

        public Parameter findByIdInternal(java.lang.String id)

      • getNotProvidedParameters

        @GET
 @Path(value="{node:.+:.*}/parameter/{mode}")
public java.util.List<ParameterVo> getNotProvidedParameters(@PathParam(value="node")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String node,
                                                                                                               @PathParam(value="mode")
                                                                                                               org.ligoj.app.api.SubscriptionMode mode)
        Return all node parameter definitions where a value is expected to be provided to the final subscription.
        Parameters:
        node - The node identifier.
        mode - Subscription mode.
        Returns:
        All parameter definitions where a value is expected to be attached to the final subscription in given mode.
